pageContent: Purpose: We evaluated quality-of-life changes (QoL) in 907 patients treated with either radical prostatectomy (open or laparoscopic), real-time planned conformal brachytherapy, or high-dose intensity-modulated radiotherapy (IMRT) on a prospective IRB-approved longitudinal study.

metaData.source:
Sexual dysfunction after treatment for genitourinary cancers
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/3849828/
